Hi Hagop,

 

Good morning and hope you are well. 

 

We would like to verify with you, do you usually share the company details to insurance vendor for compliance purposes? Below requirements and comments for reference.

 

Vendor comments:

*	INGIE ETOILE WLL: Provide the shareholding details of â€œINGIE ETOILE WLLâ€ till you reach UBO as natural person.
*	AL NUJAIMA ETOILE GROUP WLL:  Provide the shareholding details of â€œABDULAZIZ BIN MOHAMMED & SONS TRADING COMPANYâ€ and â€œETOILE INTERNATIONAL HOLDING LIMITEDâ€ till you reach UBO as natural person.

 

Requirements:

1. Complete set of TL with shareholding details (until UBO is identified as natural person)

2. Shareholding certificate issued by licensing authority

*	INGIE ETOILE WLL: Provide the shareholding details of â€œINGIE ETOILE WLLâ€ till you reach UBO as natural person.
*	AL NUJAIMA ETOILE GROUP WLL:  Provide the shareholding details of â€œABDULAZIZ BIN MOHAMMED & SONS TRADING COMPANYâ€ and â€œETOILE INTERNATIONAL HOLDING LIMITEDâ€ till you reach UBO as natural person.

 

Requirements:

1. Complete set of TL with shareholding details (until UBO is identified as natural person)

2. Shareholding certificate issued by licensing authority

3. If the shareholders are Entity â€“ please provide T/L and UBO details till you reach as a natural person

4. If the shareholders are Individual â€“ please provide PP (passport) along with visa page and Emirates ID.

5. Duly filled, signed & stamped KYC form. 

 

Looking forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/KAQOCM5yzUR59Q8fwf5c8B8SJ?domain=etoilegroup.com>
